name: Lampwork Glass Wheel Bead
description:
A large holed wheelie bead with a contemporary flair. Dramatic jet black with thin concitric circles of bright orange and pea green and periwinkle blue. This large glass lampwork bead measures 24mm with a hole opening of 11mm, 4mm thick. What a great focal point for a necklace or a creative closure for a handmade bag! #SB448

Hippkitty Beads, handmade by me, Vickie Miller, in my home studio, of Italian and German soda lime glass, are always carefully cleaned and completely kiln annealed for strength and durability. Not meant for small children.

In order to make single bead and small set listings affordable and shipping costs down I will not be insuring these packages. Your single bead, (beads), will be wrapped securely in bubble wrap and shipped in a bubble mailer. Payment by Paypal only. Washington state residents add 8.7% sales tax. (Collected by Paypal at time of purchase.)

name: Lampwork Glass Wheelie Bead
description:
A large holed wheelie bead with a contemporary flair. Dramatic jet black with thin concitric circles of bright orange and pea green with a periwinkle and black twisted design. This large glass lampwork bead measures 35mm with a hole opening of 19mm. This rather thin wheel shaped bead is 3.5mm thick. What a great focal point for a necklace or a creative closure for a handmade bag! #SB447

Hippkitty Beads, handmade by me, Vickie Miller, in my home studio, of Italian and German soda lime glass, are always carefully cleaned and completely kiln annealed for strength and durability. Not meant for small children.

In order to make single bead and small set listings affordable and shipping costs down I will not be insuring these packages. Your single bead, (beads), will be wrapped securely in bubble wrap and shipped in a bubble mailer. Payment by Paypal only. Washington state residents add 8.7% sales tax. (Collected by Paypal at time of purchase.)

name: Pale Aqua Floral Earrings
description:
Send me a message if you would like to see more photos. 

Stunning handmade lampwork glass earrings featuring spring green beads with a raised floral design in pale aqua. Tiny hearts of transparent aqua glass dangle beneath each of the floral rounds. Sterling silver French style earwires and daisy spacers. Lampwork floral beads measure 9x11mm and the overall drop length of each earring is 1-1/4". #FE197

I use only the finest components in my jewelry designs and you can be assured of the highest quality workmanship in my pieces. The lampwork beads used in my jewelry are always handmade by me, Vickie Miller, in my home studio, of imported Italian and German soda lime glass. The beads have been completely kiln annealed and carefully cleaned before assembly.

Your earrings will arrive in a ribbon-tied gift box, perfect for gift giving, within a padded bubble mailer. 

INSURED shipping within the US. Washington state residents add 8.7% sales tax. (Collected by Paypal at time of purchase.)

name: Be True Earrings
description:
The tiny handmade glass beads that dangle beneath rose colored Swarovski rondelles in my "Be True" earrings are button shaped, robin's egg blue, with a bed of ruby pink roses and variegated greenery with teensy raised bumps of jet black along the perimeter of each of the button's edges. The lampwork buttons measure a mere 12mm and are 4mm thick. Earring drop length is 1-1/4" beneath sterling silver french earwires. #FE214

Hippkitty Beads, handmade by me, Vickie Miller, in my home studio of Italian and German soda lime glass, are always carefully cleaned and completely kiln annealed for strength and durability. Not meant for small children. 

I use only the finest components in my jewelry designs and you can be assured of the highest quality finishing work. Sterling silver wire and components. Your earrings will arrive in a ribbon-tied gift box, perfect for gift giving, within a padded bubble mailer. INSURED shipping within the US.

name: Rustic Rose Earrings
description:
Red, red roses and variegated mossy green foliage on a base of creamy antique ivory with dots of turquoise blue. Tiny, drop shaped glass lampwork beads with a vintage feel. Sterling silver French ear wires. Beads measure 5x8x17mm and the drop length of each earring is 1-1/4". #FE188

Hippkitty Beads, handmade by me, Vickie Miller, in my home studio of Italian and German soda lime glass, are always carefully cleaned and completely kiln annealed for strength and durability. Not meant for small children. 

I use only the finest components in my jewelry designs and you can be assured of the highest quality finishing work. Sterling silver wire and components. Your earrings will arrive in a ribbon-tied gift box, perfect for gift giving, within a padded bubble mailer. INSURED shipping within the US.
